content: Retail fuel profitability, excluding intercompany charges for the third quarter of 2022 grew 21.5% this quarter, totaling $117.5 million or a $20.8 million increase versus Q3 2021. Third quarter convenience store operating expenses increased $20.1 million or 12.9% versus prior year due to incremental expenses related to the Handy Mart acquisition we closed in November of 2021 and an increase in expenses at same stores, including an increase of 17.4% or $10.3 million in personnel costs and $2.8 million or a 13.9% increase in credit card fees.
